tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE equipment_inventory (
    equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_type VARCHAR(50),
    team_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE inventory (
 item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 item_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 item_quantity INT,
 team_id INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES teams(team_id)
);

CREATE TABLE nets (
  net_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  net_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  net_size VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  net_material VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL,
  quantity INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE uniforms (
  uniform_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  uniform_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  uniform_color VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL,
  size VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  quantity INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE teams (
	team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	team_name TEXT,
	ball_id INT REFERENCES balls(ball_id),
	net_id INT REFERENCES nets(net_id),
	uniform_id INT REFERENCES uniforms(uniform_id)
);

CREATE TABLE balls (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    color VARCHAR(20),
    quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE nets (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    type VARCHAR(50),
    size VARCHAR(20),
    quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE uniforms (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_id INT,
    color VARCHAR(20),
    size VARCHAR(10),
    quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE teams (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    city VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE equipment_inventory (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_id INT,
    ball_id INT,
    net_id INT,
    uniform_id INT,
    quantity INT
)
